About Me

Up until recently, I've been strictly self taught. Going through the Coding Bootcamp course, however, I realized there was so very much more to learn. Because of this, I've been giving it my all to learn and understand as much as possible, in hopes of having a Full Stack understanding. Every day, I learn something new and get a little closer to that goal.

Work

Portfolio Generator

Built With: JavaScript, CSS, ES6

A Node.js experiment in creating a whole web page without a single HTML file being written. Going through the terminal questions, a user can input all the answers necessary to make a functional portfolio.
